metadata.title: CVE-2017-7071 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: An issue was discovered in certain Apple products. Safari before 10.1 isaffected. The issue involves the "WebKit" component. It allows remoteattackers to execute arbitrary code or cause a denial of service (memorycorruption and application crash) via a crafted web site.

criterions.comment: webkitgtk: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue.
qtwebkit-source: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue.
qtwebkit-opensource-src package in bionic is affected and may need fixing.
